talk.author: did:plc:5ch4gfcd32g32ljkuokyb2ng
talk.utter: Exactly. They are complicit. They are the only ones that can save these women’s lives and they don’t. We need to make lists so women won’t use them. Hit them in their pocketbooks. And if that doesn’t work, dox them.

talk.author: did:plc:zdf2ts4l5yqwj7w5i2o3h3tv
talk.utter: The silence from their professional orgs when all this was going down- was deafening but then I think a lot of them secretly agree with this BS but still want to be liked or thought of as not a monster

talk.author: did:plc:5ch4gfcd32g32ljkuokyb2ng
talk.utter: They are protecting their $$ and power.
